query.name: template_id
query.description: message template id, 1: normal text message 3: picture message 4: emoji message 10006: item message 10007: order message 10008: voucher message 10010: invite buyers to follow the store 6: video message, use this API to upload video (The video duration is greater than 3s and less than 180s)

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/im/message/send')
request.add_api_parameter("session_id", "100094063_2_1011822749_1_103")
request.add_api_parameter("template_id", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("txt", "test message")
request.add_api_parameter("img_url", "https://sg-live-02.slatic.net/p/0dc6fb4898f7e991bf44c45471dca9c9.jpg")
request.add_api_parameter("width", "100")
request.add_api_parameter("height", "100")
request.add_api_parameter("item_id", "1762013406")
request.add_api_parameter("order_id", "1762013406")
request.add_api_parameter("promotion_id", "91471122422003")
request.add_api_parameter("video_id", "3678332")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/im/message/send')
request.add_api_param('session_id', '100094063_2_1011822749_1_103')
request.add_api_param('template_id', '1')
request.add_api_param('txt', 'test message')
request.add_api_param('img_url', 'https://sg-live-02.slatic.net/p/0dc6fb4898f7e991bf44c45471dca9c9.jpg')
request.add_api_param('width', '100')
request.add_api_param('height', '100')
request.add_api_param('item_id', '1762013406')
request.add_api_param('order_id', '1762013406')
request.add_api_param('promotion_id', '91471122422003')
request.add_api_param('video_id', '3678332')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
